definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: sluggishness;—´[[י]] Pr 19:15; du. intens. [[עֲחַלְתַּיִם]] Ec 10:18 double (i.e. great) sluggishness (so Thes De al.; rd. then perhaps [[עֵחְלָתַיִם]]; > fr. [[עָחֵל]] a sluggish pair, i.e. hands Ew al.), but improb.; ‖[[שִׁפְלוּת יׇדַיִם]], whence Bi conj. [[עֵחְלוּת]], Siegf [[עֵחְלַת יׇדַיִם]].
